title: Future Recon Jhin/Future Ranger Jhin (WIP)
body: Hey guys! I was thinking about a new Jhin skin, because his only skin is High Noon Jhin. Now, I followed the idea of "Cyborg Bounty Hunter" of Jhin's development, so I gave it a futuristic touch. It would be appreciated if you'd check it out and give me a feedback. Still WIP.
